short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to your encrypted notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TrustyNotes is a modern and secure Markdown note taking extension designed for privacy-conscious users.

Whether you’re brainstorming ideas, jotting down quick reminders, or organizing detailed plans, Trusty Notes ensures your data stays encrypted and accessible only to you.

Markdown and Rich Text Editors with Live Preview: Write and format notes effortlessly with real-time previews.
End-to-End Encrypted Sync: Your data is private and secure—always.
Cloud Sync Across Devices: Access your notes anywhere, anytime.
Offline Access: Work on your notes even without an internet connection.

Take control of your notes with TrustyNotes—secure, modern, and beautifully simple.
